product_name: Black Diamond Wiz Headlamp - Kids' - 2011 Blemished
long_description: The Black Diamond Wiz headlamp lets youngsters enjoy hands-free lighting, just like the adults! Wiz was designed with children in mind; it's not only smaller than adult headlamps, it's thoroughly tested to standup to kid-type use. Elastic band has pull-away fittings so if a child catches it on a limb or door handle it simply comes apart under the pressure. Power of the 2 LED bulbs is set at mid brightness so kids don't unintentionally blind themselves-or their parents! But don't be concerned, the Wiz provides plenty of light for nighttime reading and walking around a dark campsite. Features 2 modes, on and strobe, operated from a single, easily used switch. Headlamp automatically turns off after 1 hr. to save battery life, in case a child falls asleep with it on or forgets it lost under the covers. Tiltable housing lets a youngster adjust the natural direction of light to suit current needs. Operates on 2 AAA batteries, included. Blemished; item has minor cosmetic blemishes that do not affect product performance.
short_description: The Black Diamond Wiz headlamp lets youngsters enjoy hands-free lighting, just like the adults!
